channel.title: Dyeing capes XD
channel.description:
Hello.
I believe the source I am using is a highly modified version of the original Whitescape 2. My problem is with dying capes. Once you have dyed one, or used dye or a cape on something then you can't use any item on any other item at all.
Why?
I would appreciate any help for this :)
Thanks
Krimson Eagl

item.title: Dyeing capes XD
